director.name: Raj Singh Chaudhary Raj Singh Chaudhary

this_title: Bharat Ka Veer Putra Maharana Pratap
introduction: Bharat Ka Veer Putra – Maharana Pratap is an Indian television series produced by Abhimanyu Singh of Contiloe Entertainment, based on the life of 16th century's Great Rajput ruler of Mewar, Maharana Pratap Singh who showed extraordinary valour and chivalry against the Islamic invaders in India. The series premiered on Sony TV on May 27, 2013. The series is introduced by Bollywood actor Amitabh Bachchan.
foreign_title: Bharat Ka Veer Putra Maharana Pratap
